text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a TERR

name: RoleClassTerritoryOfAuthority
title: RoleClassTerritoryOfAuthority
description: Relates a place entity (player) as the region over which the scoper (typically an Organization) has certain authority (jurisdiction). For example, the Calgary Regional Health Authority (scoper) has authority over the territory "Region 4 of Alberta" (player) in matters of health.
